Summary: Witnessed in the same area on consecutive nights orb like lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI've witnessed this event over the course of five night in the Charlotte area in the same location. Orb like objects with different coloration traveling threw the area. They disappear then reappear in different locations, but have had generally the same flight characteristics which aren't conventional to our known man made aircraft. They also leave the area into ascending into space with high rates of speed after they're done performing these arial displays. Will keep a camra with me the next few nights to try and catch this event on video if it continues.
